Font style.guideline: Use Lexend as the primary typeface
Use Inter as the secondary typeface

Logo safe zone.guideline: Maintain a minimum clear space of 30px around the logo
Logo safe zone.evidence: The minimum required clear space is defined by measurement “X”. X is 30px.

Logo safe zone.guideline: Do not place any graphic or typographic elements within the logo safe zone
Logo safe zone.evidence: The Safe Zone should not contain any graphic or typhographic elements other than the logotype itself.

Logo colours.guideline: Do not shuffle around the icon colors
Logo colours.evidence: Do not shuffle around the Icon colors

Logo colours.guideline: Do not use different colors for the logo

Colour palette (overall image).guideline: Use a palette of fun and light colors to reflect the brand’s dynamic
Colour palette (overall image).evidence: We have intentionally chosen a palette of fun and light colors to reflect our brand’s dynamic.

Colour palette (overall image).guideline: Include primary brand colors: French Sky Blue (#85A0FE), Lavender (#AA82FF), Tulip (#FE839C), Bright Sun (#FFD14C), Dark Indigo (#380F57)
Colour palette (overall image).evidence: Primary colors … French Sky Blue #85A0FE … Lavender #AA82FF …

Colour palette (overall image).guideline: Use extended color palette tints at 120%, Base, 80%, 60%, 40%, 20%, 10%

other.guideline: Do not use drop shadows or any other effects on the logo
other.evidence: Do not use drop shadows or any other effects

other.guideline: Do not change the size or position of the icon and typeface
other.evidence: Do not change the size or position of the Icon and Typeface
